snippet: Starting with his first Los Angeles restaurant in the mid-1950s, Mr. Cano helped popularize Mexican food among Americans with his version of the cuisine.
abstract: Larry J Cano, who helped popularize Mexican food among Americans by founding the El Torito restaurant chain in the 1950s, dies at age 90.
lead_paragraph: Starting with his first Los Angeles restaurant in the mid-1950s, Mr. Cano helped popularize Mexican food among Americans with his version of the cuisine.

headline.main: Larry J. Cano, El Torito Founder, Dies at 90
headline.print_headline: Larry J. Cano, 90, El Torito Founder
